short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Perplexity and GPT to your context menus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open in AI Hub is a powerful and user-friendly Google Chrome extension designed to enhance productivity by allowing users to effortlessly send selected text directly to ChatGPT or Perplexity for instant information retrieval, clarification, or creative assistance. By integrating a context menu, this extension streamlines the process of querying AI models, making it simple to enhance your browsing experience without needing to manually copy and paste text.
